snippet.title: The Springlock: Aftermath - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Featured on Fazbear Gameverse 4, teaser trailer for my upcoming FNAF fan-game The Springlock: Aftermath! 
Play the demo NOW:
https://gamejolt.com/games/springlockam/506426

You're tasked with investigating Fazbear Entertainment's old private warehouse to gather information about their connection with William Afton and upload it to cloud storage. However, things take a turn when spectral visitors appear. Are you ready for the challenge?

The Springlock: Aftermath is an FNAF fan-game featuring over 2 hours of gameplay with 11 intriguing main nights and tons of extra content. There is something new to experience every night!

#fnaf
